name: Baked Sweet Potatoes with Ginger and Honey
author: Christine L.
summary: Fresh ginger, cardamom, and sweet potatoes will fill your house with a fall fragrance as well as call your family to the table.
ingredients: 3 pounds sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
In a large bowl, toss together the sweet potatoes, honey, ginger, walnut oil, cardamom, and pepper
Transfer to a large cast iron frying pan
Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven
Stir the potatoes to expose the pieces from the bottom of the pan
Bake for another 20 minutes, or until the sweet potatoes are tender and caramelized on the outside
